languages.text: "Несомненно, Лорд-капитан". {n}Губы Мастера дисциплины вытягиваются в тонкую линию.{/n} "Быть может, служительница смерти поделится своими догадками? Чтобы мы все понимали, что здесь произошло и что делать дальше".

"Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, Лорд-капитан". {n}Губы Мастера дисциплины вытягиваются в тонкую линию.{/n} "Быть может, служительница смерти поделится своими догадками? Чтобы мы все понимали, что здесь произошло и что делать дальше".

traits.locale_text: "Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}Jocasta presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights? So we can all understand what happened here and what to do next."

"Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."

languages.text: "Zweifellos, Lord Captain." {n}Sie presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strich zusammen.{/n} "Vielleicht teilt die Dienerin des Todes ihre Einblicke, damit wir alle verstehen, was hier geschehen ist und was wir als Nächstes tun sollen."
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."

traits.locale_text: "Zweifellos, Lord Captain." {n}Sie presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strich zusammen.{/n} "Vielleicht teilt die Dienerin des Todes ihre Einblicke, damit wir alle verstehen, was hier geschehen ist und was wir als Nächstes tun sollen."

languages.text: «Sin duda, Lord Capitán», {n}dice apretando los labios.{/n} «Tal vez la sierva de la muerte quiera compartir sus observaciones para que todos podamos comprender lo que ha sucedido aquí y qué debemos hacer al respecto».
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda, Lord Capitán», {n}dice apretando los labios.{/n} «Tal vez la sierva de la muerte quiera compartir sus observaciones para que todos podamos comprender lo que ha sucedido aquí y qué debemos hacer al respecto».

languages.text: 「そうに違いありません、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は唇を薄く尖らせる。{/n}「恐らく、死の従者は彼女の見た物をシェアするのです。みんな、ここで何が起こり、次に何をすべきかを理解できるのでは」
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."

traits.locale_text: 「そうに違いありません、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は唇を薄く尖らせる。{/n}「恐らく、死の従者は彼女の見た物をシェアするのです。みんな、ここで何が起こり、次に何をすべきかを理解できるのでは」

languages.text: “这毫无疑问，舰长大人。”{n}她将嘴唇抿成了一条细线。{/n}“或许死亡的仆人愿意分享她的见解，让我们明白这里发生了什么事情，弄清接下来该做什么。”
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."

traits.locale_text: “这毫无疑问，舰长大人。”{n}她将嘴唇抿成了一条细线。{/n}“或许死亡的仆人愿意分享她的见解，让我们明白这里发生了什么事情，弄清接下来该做什么。”

languages.text: « Assurément, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}lâche-t-elle, les mâchoires crispées.{/n} Peut-être la servante de la mort pourrait-elle partager ses conclusions avec nous, afin que nous puissions comprendre ce qu'il s'est passé ici et ce qu'il convient de faire ? »
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."

traits.locale_text: « Assurément, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}lâche-t-elle, les mâchoires crispées.{/n} Peut-être la servante de la mort pourrait-elle partager ses conclusions avec nous, afin que nous puissions comprendre ce qu'il s'est passé ici et ce qu'il convient de faire ? »

languages.text: "Kuşkusuz Lord Kaptan." {n}Dudakları, incecik bir çizgi hâlini alıyor.{/n} "Belki de ölümün hizmetkârı, bizimle içgörülerini paylaşır. Böylece hepimiz, burada neler yaşandığını ve bir sonraki adımımızın ne olacağını kestirebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly, Lord Captain." {n}She presses her lips into a thin line.{/n} "Perhaps the servant of death will share her insights, that we might all understand what happened here and what we should do next."
